title: The Complete JavaScript Course 2023: From Zero to Expert!
summary: Key concepts mastered include JavaScript fundamentals (functions, arrays, objects, loops, strings, etc.), modern object-oriented programming (OOP), and asynchronous JavaScript (event loop, promises, AJAX calls, and APIs).

title: Modern HTML & CSS From The Beginning 2.0 (2024 Revamp)
summary: Core skills acquired include creating responsive websites using media queries, semantic HTML elements, and the box model; implementing smooth transitions and adaptable layouts with CSS Grid and Flexbox; managing version control with Git and GitHub; and deploying websites.

title: Java 17 Masterclass: Start Coding in 2024
summary: Topics covered include foundational Java concepts like arrays, loops, Lists, ArrayLists, LinkedLists, and autoboxing, along with object-oriented programming (OOP), generics, regular expressions, streams, and exception handling with try-catch statements.
